
# Auto-generated farming macro (PDCA Plan Phase)
# Character: TestKnight (Lv 75 Knight)
# Target: Poring at prt_fild08
# Strategy: Efficient leveling

automacro farm_Poring {
    exclusive 1
    map prt_fild08
    timeout 5
    run-once 0
    call {
        # Move to farming area
        do move 150 200
        do ai manual
        
        # Attack sequence
        do attack "Poring"
        pause 0.5
        
        # Loot drops
        do take
        
        # Return to auto mode
        do ai auto
    }
}
